column4: Is there a browser in linux where FLASH wont make my browsing experience all CHOPPY?
Is there a browser in linux where FLASH wont make my browsing experience all CHOPPY?
the flash implementation for linux is not as good as for windows
there is nothing you can do about it
im using the 64bit alpha and even on a powerfull machine its bad
its gnash. I dont use it because there is little flash 9,10 support
the non free IS the adobe version
cry baby seems to be trying to ruin the support irc
just interesting to me how there arent major complaints about this
i think everyone is annoyed about it
